thread.title: Peru Seeks Detention of Ex-President Alejandro Toledo
thread.title_full: Peru Seeks Detention of Ex-President Alejandro Toledo - WSJ

author: Ryan Dube
title: Peru Seeks Detention of Ex-President Alejandro Toledo
text:
LIMA, Peru—Peruvian prosecutors requested the arrest of former President Alejandro Toledo over accusations he accepted millions of dollars in bribes from Brazilian construction company Odebrecht SA, which has been at the center of a corruption scandal jolting the region.

The attorney general’s office said Tuesday that it requested Mr. Toledo’s “preventive detention” for 18 months while it prepares charges. The judiciary said on its...
